TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit UnionCodeGroup extends System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup
Public NotInheritable Class UnionCodeGroup Inherits CodeGroup
public ref class UnionCodeGroup sealed : System::Security::Policy::CodeGroup

summary.span: 表示程式碼群組，它的原則陳述式是目前程式碼群組原則陳述式和其所有相符子程式碼群組原則陳述式的聯合。

span.span: Represents a code group whose policy statement is the union of the current code group's policy statement and the policy statement of all its matching child code groups.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程式碼群組是建置組塊的程式碼存取安全性原則。Code groups are the building blocks of code access security policy. 每個原則層級可以有子程式碼群組 （依此類推），進而形成樹狀的根程式碼群組所組成。Each policy level consists of a root code group that can have child code groups (and so on), forming a tree. 每個程式碼群組都具有成員資格條件，決定是否指定的組件或隸屬於它不是，根據該組件的辨識項。Each code group has a membership condition that determines if a given assembly belongs to it or not, based on the evidence for that assembly. 成員資格符合指定的組件的唯一程式碼群組和其子程式碼群組套用原則。Only code groups whose membership conditions match a given assembly and their child code groups apply policy. 是最常見的程式碼群組; 類型原則陳述式的所有相符的子程式碼群組 (和延伸模組及其子程式碼群組) 會與符合父程式碼群組的權限集結合。 is the most common type of code group; the policy statement of all matching child code groups (and by extension their child code groups) are combined with the permission set of the matching parent code group. 因此，如果其成員資格條件符合時，這個程式碼群組會形成原則陳述式的 union 以及與其所有子程式碼群組，也符合的辨識項。Thus, if its membership condition matches, this code group forms the union of its policy statement and those of all its child code groups that also match the evidence. 程式碼群組會 CASPOL 公用程式所建立的程式碼群組 (請參閱[Caspol.exe （程式碼存取安全性原則工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md))。 code groups are the code groups created by the CASPOL utility (see [Caspol.exe (Code Access Security Policy Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Policy.IMembershipCondition membershipCondition, class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement policy) cil managed
Public Sub New (membershipCondition As IMembershipCondition, policy As PolicyStatement)

param.name: membershipCondition
param.span: 成員資格條件，其測試辨識項以判斷這個程式碼群組是否套用原則。

span.span: A membership condition that tests evidence to determine whether this code group applies policy.

param.name: policy
param.span: 程式碼群組的原則陳述式，形式為要授與符合成員資格條件的程式碼之使用權限集合和屬性 (Attribute)。

span.span: The policy statement for the code group in the form of a permission set and attributes to grant code that matches the membership condition.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立基本的程式碼群組，並應從自訂程式碼群組的建構函式呼叫。This constructor creates a basic code group and should be called from the constructors of custom code groups. 您可以將子程式碼群組加入使用方法。You can add child code groups by using the method.

span.span: The type of the parameter is not valid.
-or-
The type of the parameter is not valid.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup Copy() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Copy () As CodeGroup

summary.span: 製作目前程式碼群組的深層複本 (Deep Copy)。

span.span: Makes a deep copy of the current code group.

returns.span: 目前程式碼群組的相等複本，包含它的成員資格條件和子程式碼群組。

span.span: An equivalent copy of the current code group, including its membership conditions and child code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這樣也會套用程式碼群組包含的所有物件的複本，此方法會讓程式碼群組的深層複本。This method makes a deep copy of the code group, so that copies of all objects the code group contains are also made.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property MergeLogic As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ MergeLogic { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the merge logic.
Always the string "Union".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement Resolve(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.

summary.span: 解析程式碼群組的原則和其辨識項集合的子代。

span.span: Resolves policy for the code group and its descendants for a set of evidence.

returns.span: 原則陳述式，包含由程式碼群組使用選擇性屬性授與的使用權限，或為 ，如果程式碼群組無法套用 (成員資格條件不符合指定的辨識項)。

span.span: A policy statement consisting of the permissions granted by the code group with optional attributes, or if the code group does not apply (the membership condition does not match the specified evidence).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定要載入的組件的辨識項，這個方法會評估第一個檢查成員資格條件，針對指定的辨識項的程式碼群組。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果沒有相符項目，這個方法會傳回程式碼群組，包括評估子程式碼群組的原則陳述式。If there is a match, this method returns a policy statement for the code group, including evaluation of child code groups. 等位的程式碼群組，也會解析所有子程式碼群組的成員資格條件符合的辨識項，且所有產生的原則陳述式構成具有父代等位的程式碼群組的原則陳述式的等位。For union code groups, all child code groups whose membership condition match the evidence are also resolved, and all resulting policy statements form a union with the policy statement of the parent union code group. 每一個子程式碼群組類型則決定它的子群組的套用方式、 如何根據其各自方法運作。Each child code group type determines how its child groups are applied, depending on how their respective methods work. .NET Framework 安全性系統會使用來判斷哪些權限可授與要載入的程式碼，從產生的原則陳述式和程式碼要求組件上的原則層級上。The .NET Framework security system uses on the policy levels to determine which permissions to grant to loaded code from the resulting policy statements and the code request on the assembly. 如果成員資格條件不符合指定的辨識項，則這個方法會傳回`null`; 否則它將權限設定為傳回 (P) 設定為等於程式碼群組的原則陳述式，然後再繼續執行。If the membership condition does not match the specified evidence, this method returns `null`; otherwise, it sets the permission set to be returned (P) equal to the code group's policy statement, and then continues. 針對每一個子程式碼群組，方法會將解析程式碼群組使用相同的辨識項。如果結果不是`null`，它會設定 P 等於 P 和子程式碼群組的原則陳述式的 union。For each child code group, the method resolves the code group with the same evidence; if the result is not `null`, it sets P equal to the union of P and the child code group's policy statement. 然後，它會傳回 P，現在是目前的程式碼群組原則陳述式和所有子群組的原則陳述式的 union。It then returns P, which is now the union of the current code group's policy statement and all child group policy statements.

span.span: The parameter is .

exception.span: 一個以上的程式碼群組 (包含父程式碼群組和任何的子程式碼群組) 標記為 。

span.span: More than one code group (including the parent code group and any child code groups) is marked .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup ResolveMatchingCodeGroups(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.

summary.span: 解析符合的程式碼群組。

span.span: Resolves matching code groups.

returns.span: 與辨識項相符的一組完整的程式碼群組。

span.span: The complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定要載入的組件的辨識項，這個方法會評估第一個檢查成員資格條件，針對指定的辨識項的程式碼群組。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果沒有相符項目，這個方法會傳回根程式碼群組。If there is a match, this method returns a root code group. 傳回的程式碼群組可能包含子程式碼群組，其中，接著，也可能包含子程式碼群組，因此傳回值會反映出一組完整的程式碼群組，以符合所提供的辨識項。The code group that is returned may contain child code groups, which, in turn, may also contain child code groups, so the return value reflects the complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence provided.

span.span: The parameter is .
